summary: A former mental patient uses astral projection to destroy the people he believes have wronged him.
cast: Paul Burke|Jim Hutton|Julie Adams|Nehemiah Persoff|Neville Brand|Aldo Ray|Whit Bissell|Rod Cameron|Della Reese|Mary Charlotte Wilcox|Judith Brown|Joseph Della Sorte|Greydon Clark|Harry Holcombe|Robin Raymond|Jerry James|Diane Deininger|John Dennis|Bill Quinn|Marland Proctor|Walter O. Miles|Stack Pierce|Mello Alexandria|Sandra Rustam|William Bonner|Edward Cross|Ray Danton|Sheldon Lee
title: Psychic Killer
